title: Note - Both the smoke check lobby with evacuation lift shall have positive level difference of minimum 75 mm
clause_text: Note - Both the smoke check lobby with evacuation lift shall have positive level difference of minimum 75 mm. with respect to staircase landing or mid-landing level to avoid ingress of water in fireman lift shaft.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
